edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will generate a randomized array of strings from a given array of strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Generator(java.lang.String[] words, java.util.Random rng)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Generator

        public Generator(java.lang.String[] words,
                 java.util.Random rng)
          throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        words - A String array of initial words that will be randomized.
        rng - Random number generator used to randomize the original string of words.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Exception will be thrown if no rng is specified or if no initial string is provided.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Exception will be thrown if number of words provided in the initial string of words is zero.

    • Method Detail

      • next

        public java.lang.String next()
        Returns:
        Returns a random word or a randomized set of words from the original string.

      • next

        public java.lang.String[] next(int numWords,
                               boolean duplicatesAllowed)
                        throws java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException,
                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        numWords - Number of words requested by user to be returned.
        duplicatesAllowed - Specifies whether duplicate results in the randomized list will be allowed.
        Returns:
        Returns the randomized word into the new array list of words that will result.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
